item.title: Commonwealth Ministries
item.description: ß· Part of the state series of articles Commonwealth Ministries are departments headed by a Sorda. The portfolios within ministries are usually assigned to qualified Cabinet members. Ministries are assigned with aspects of government that are partially devolved to Constituents, and as such are much larger than Council Secretariats. item.content:encoded:
ß· Part of the state series of articles
Commonwealth Ministries are departments headed by a Sorda. The portfolios within ministries are usually assigned to qualified Cabinet members. Ministries are assigned with aspects of government that are partially devolved to Constituents, and as such are much larger than Council Secretariats.

item.title: Councils
item.description: ß· Part of the state series of articles The Commonwealth councils, known as secretariats in Vekllei, are a superior kind of ministry headed by a secretary. Vekllei Ministries answer to the Commonwealth Parliament, whereas councils report directly to the Commonwealth Council. In practice, councils are federalised and so carry out their roles directly, unlike the devolved ministries.
item.content:encoded:
ß· Part of the state series of articles
The Commonwealth councils, known as secretariats in Vekllei, are a superior kind of ministry headed by a secretary. Vekllei Ministries answer to the Commonwealth Parliament, whereas councils report directly to the Commonwealth Council. In practice, councils are federalised and so carry out their roles directly, unlike the devolved ministries.

item.title: Crown
item.description: ß· Part of the state series of articles The Commonwealth Parliament is the supranational governing body of the Vekllei Commonwealth and its member-states.
